resources.string: If a player commits Foul and a Miss three times in a row while the object ball is fully visible, this results in the frame being automatically lost. If this is the case, please choose to forfeit frame.
Are you sure you want to cancel the current match? All match progress will be lost.
Are you sure you want to rerack? All frame progress will be lost.
This frame is still in progress, are you sure you want to end it?
This match is still in progress, are you sure you want to end it?
This frame has mathematically ended. Would you like to proceed?
This match has mathematically ended. Would you like to proceed?
A typical foul in snooker is worth 4 points. You may wish to decrease this value.
There was a foul committed on the last black. According to regulations, the frame is now over.
Looks like you and your opponent are tied at the end of the frame! The black ball will be re-spotted to decide the winner. The player who started the frame will attempt to pot the black first.
If you experienced any issues during this match you can submit an action log, which will be reviewed by the developer. Would you like to submit an action log?
NOTE: Please read carefully, this action cannot be undone
NOTE: Keeping the current frame will result in a draw
NOTE: Discarding the current frame will result in a draw
